name: BLIP (OllieOA)
description:
NOTE: THE ONLY DATA SAVED IS THE MAXIMUM LEVEL EVER REACHED, WHICH IS GONE TO WHEN YOU CLICK CONTINUE

Blip is a logistics puzzle game requiring you to undertake the logical work of dealing with computer bits. You are the Bits Logistics Implementation Program, or B.L.I.P for short!

This is the first game I have ever made. Doing a gamejam was a great way to learn!

Submitted for the Godot Wild Gamejam #37

Gamejam-specific stuff - only one Wildcard was chosen; Time Dilation.

NOTE - I have submitted this in the early hours of the morning for me, and fully intend to update this page after a sleep and a workday.

Controls

There are no in-game controls, unfortunately

  • WASD to move
  • E or H to interact
  • Number keys (row or numpad) to select machine
  • X or Del to enter destruction mode
  • C or Q to cancel build mode
